Summary: Equity Residential (EQR) faces direct risk from 1 bill with 5 direct impacts, including $608,000 in subsidies; no indirect risks; overall risk assessment: low.
SummaryKeypoints: H.R. 5376 - Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 provides $400,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of a retrofit that achieves modeled energy system savings of not less than 35 percent, $4,000 per dwelling unit, with a maximum of $400,000 per multifamily building"

H.R. 5376 - Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 provides $200,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of a retrofit that achieves modeled energy system savings of not less than 20 percent but less than 35 percent, $2,000 per dwelling unit, with a maximum of $200,000 per multifamily building"

H.R. 5376 - Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 provides $8,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of a retrofit that achieves modeled energy system savings of not less than 35 percent, the lesser of— (I) $8,000 per single-family home or dwelling unit; and (II) 80 percent of the project cost"

H.R. 5376 - Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 provides $4,000 in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "in the case of a retrofit that achieves modeled energy system savings of not less than 20 percent but less than 35 percent, the lesser of— (I) $4,000 per single-family home or dwelling unit; and (II) 80 percent of the project cost"
H.R. 5376 - Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 provides 80% in subsidy. affecting operations in United States. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "80 percent of the project cost"
